body:
Remy, Ciaran and I are tired of getting random russians in our CSGO competitive games who flame and team kill and are generally a pain up the ass. We are looking for two active team mates to play with us and complete the team.
Requirements:
Must be gn3 - mge 
pretty active
EU timezone
Can be AWPer or Rifle - rifle is preferred.
Be able to have fun and play seriously 

Add me on skype ( b.banno321 ) and leave a post on here saying that you added me.
Thank you and good luck :)

replies.body:
I can AWP and rifle, and shotgun, and smg, and r8 revolver. ;)
But forreal though, I'm gn1 but I only play with MG's (MG1-MGE). I'll normally second frag.
I do AWP though and I can rifle.

replies.body: I'm Global Elite and I'm the best P90 player. I know my spray pattern with the P90 and I can use the Dak-Dak quite well as well.
